title: Haven't Received Mastery 6 token after ranked 3v3 .

replies.body: Congrats on doing so well in Twisted Treeline!  Currently per the [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide, tokens are only rewarded in Summoner's Rift.  You'll want to get those solid scores through that mode.  Let me know if that clears things up!
